sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均含"陡峭的，险峻的"之意。
means: steep ： 指坡度向上逐渐增加的斜陡坡，强调险峻，暗示难于攀登。
abrupt ： 着重指地形突然起伏，形成尖角状。
sheer ： 指自始至终近于垂直的陡峭，不仅仅很难爬上去，甚至于不可能攀登。

sentence.Network_en: Cross was a little taken aback by her abrupt manner.
sentence.Network_cn: 她鲁莽的态度让克罗斯感到有点吃惊。

sentence.Network_en: Then in a tone of abrupt harshness, he added, "Open these trunks!".
sentence.Network_cn: 然后他又突然厉声说道，“把这些大箱子打开！”

sentence.Network_en: Mullins knocked me off-balance with his abrupt change of subject.
sentence.Network_cn: 马林斯突然改变话题，这让我措手不及。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 雅思词汇表_百度文库 ... abound 丰富 abrupt 突然的，陡峭的 abstain 戒，避开.
免费-2013高考词汇表_百度文库 ... absence n. 不在，缺席 abrupt a. 突然的，意外的，粗鲁 absent a. 缺席， 不在.
新编大学英语单词表(第一册) - 豆丁网 ... upset a. 心烦的， 苦恼的 abrupt a. 唐突的， 鲁莽的 accompany v. 伴随.
英语单词词根词典 ...abrupt 突然,陡峭的abscond 潜逃,逃匿

abrupt contact 突变接触abrupt curve 陡度曲线abrupt slope 陡坡

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from Latin abruptus 'broken off, steep', past participle of abrumpere, from ab- 'away, from' + rumpere 'break'

entry.tran: 突然的，意外的（常指令人不快的改变或行为）
entry.def: An abrupt change or action is very sudden, often in a way which is unpleasant.

example.ex: Rosie's idyllic world came to an abrupt end when her parents' marriage broke up...
example.tran: 父母婚姻的破裂使得罗茜田园诗般美好的世界陡然画上了句号。

example.ex: The recession brought an abrupt halt to this happiness...
example.tran: 经济衰退让这幸福戛然而止。

entry.def: Someone who is abrupt speaks in a rather rude, unfriendly way.

example.ex: He was abrupt to the point of rudeness...
example.tran: 他的唐突已到了无礼的地步。

example.ex: Cross was a little taken aback by her abrupt manner.
example.tran: 她鲁莽的态度让克罗斯感到有点吃惊。

means.word_mean: 1. marked by sudden changes in subject and sharp transitions;

sentences.sentence: "the precipitous rapids of the upper river"

means.word_mean: 4. surprisingly and unceremoniously brusque in manner;

auth_sentence.content: There was something abrupt and deflecting in his humor.
auth_sentence.res_content: There was something abrupt and deflecting in his humor.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There was something abrupt and deflecting in his humor.

auth_sentence.content: Their abrupt falling-out had done nothing to alter her conviction.
auth_sentence.res_content: Their abrupt falling-out had done nothing to alter her conviction.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Their abrupt falling-out had done nothing to alter her conviction.

auth_sentence.content: Their movements were slow, their gesticulations abrupt and angular.
auth_sentence.res_content: Their movements were slow, their gesticulations abrupt and angular.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Their movements were slow, their gesticulations abrupt and angular.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 突然的,出其不意的;[行为等]粗鲁无礼的
stems_affixes.word_buile: ab离开+rupt断裂→突然的[断开,离开]
bank银行+rupt断裂→adj.破产的;彻底缺乏的 v.使破产n.破产者
cor全部+rupt断→全部断→变坏的,腐败的
bank银行+rupt断裂→adj.破产的;彻底缺乏的 v.使破产n.破产者
corrupt[adj.腐败的;变环的]+ion表名词→n.腐化;腐坏;败坏
disrupt[v.使混乱,使崩溃,使分裂,使瓦解]+ion表名词→n.中断,分裂,瓦解,破坏
interrupt[v.中断,遮断,阻碍;打断[话],打扰]+ion表名词→n.中断,打断;障碍物

stems_affixes.value_cn: 破裂, 决裂, 敌对, 割裂
stems_affixes.word_buile: rupt断裂+ure→n.&v.破裂, 决裂, 敌对, 割裂
bank银行+rupt断裂→adj.破产的;彻底缺乏的 v.使破产n.破产者

stems_affixes.value_cn: 使混乱,使崩溃,使分裂,使瓦解
stems_affixes.word_buile: dis分开+rupt断裂→分开断→使崩溃,瓦解

stems_affixes.value_cn: 中断,遮断,阻碍;打断[话],打扰
stems_affixes.word_buile: inter在……中间+rupt断裂→讲话中间被打断

sentences.en: I don't know the cause of his abrupt leave.
sentences.cn: 我不知道他突然离去的原因。

means.word_mean: （言语、行为）粗鲁的，莽撞的，唐突的；生硬的 , 鲁莽的

sentences.en: She always sounds abrupt on the telephone.
sentences.cn: 在电话中听起来她总像很无礼。

sentences.en: An abrupt descent suddenly appeared before him.
sentences.cn: 他面前突然出现一个陡峭的斜坡。

jushi.english: His abrupt reply hurt our feelings.
jushi.chinese: 他粗鲁的回答伤了我们的感情。

jushi.english: Here the river takes an abrupt bend to the west.
jushi.chinese: 这条河在这里急转向西流去。

jushi.english: The road ended in an abrupt slope down to the sea.
jushi.chinese: 道路在一处朝向大海的陡坡处中止。
